title: New Metropolian without the grunged/eroded style
content:
hiho outthere,

could anyone name the font, when it does NOT have this eroded style of the one shown in the attached jpg?!  
btw: the eroded one is named: 'The New Metropolian'.

thx in advance  
Josey
